Suddenly something starting to glow. It is Heart of Kandrakar - The Oracle is calling.
Will noticed that glowing and contacted other girls.

After 1 hour were they all standing in Kandrakar in front of The Oracle.
He explained all about problem with some new world. This world appeared so suddenly and it was covered in mystery because even The Oracle couldn't see what kind of world it is and what's happening there.

So, Guardians went to scout mission...

What happened when they arived?

info.brief_description: WITCH: Will,Irma,Taranee,Cornelia & HayLin in whole new 'adventure'. GPs for good chapters
info.description:
Will, Irma, Taranee, Cornelia and Hay Lin got new mission. New world appear, but nobody, even Oracle, don't know what is hidding there. W.I.T.C.H. was sent on scout mission. What they will found they would never imagine.

Gift points for good additions.
No killing or sudden ends.
